3: This is the end, Gray Raven!

4: All units, brace for what's to come!

3: Gabriel knocks Ayla away violently, then spreads his hand, amassing a ball of energy.
Too late.
What?!

But, in the middle of the charging up, a pillar of energy burns through the air from the sky, detonating the ball of energy, causing Gabriel's arm to explode from the chain reaction. Smokes surrounds Gabriel in an instant.
Death from above... So this is what you've been hiding?
If it makes you feel better, sure. Just a satellite attack. Took a while to get it connected.

2: Is this what you needed us to buy time for?

3: Yeah, and the signal jamming from Kowloong was messing things up... but good thing it launched in time.
Naturally. Just stand back and watch, Commandant!

Lee talks while advancing and suppressing Gabriel, pushing him back through the continuous orbital attacks. Under the onslaught, Gabriel can no longer dodge all the attacks, but is forced to defend and block as well.
A commendable attempt. But once the interval and the range of the attack is laid bare, that orbital attack becomes a mere toy. I'll finish you now!
I won't let you take another step closer.
Lee activates his holographic targeting display. One, two, four, more and more beams rain down from the sky.
Dodge this.
The beams multiply in numbers, falling in sheets, cutting off Gabriel's escape.
To increase your coverage, you have lowered its output. Foolish, Gray Raven gunsman!
Wasn't targeting you in the first place, Gabriel.
You...!
The scattered beams of light drizzle like rain into the chamber. The flower petals around become torn and soar from the impact of the energy. Dust clouds billow, obscuring everyone's vision.
...I had thought Roland's pride led to his downfall. But it appears I was gravely mistaken.
Gray Raven, this key must be given to Miss Luna intact... A battle to the death will have to wait for another day.
Amidst the light, Gabriel bids his farewell.
